pullRequest.title: Test multiple model files in domain's configmap
pullRequest.bodyText: Add a test that creates a MII domain that has two WDT model files in its configmap, and verifies that the resultant configuration is as expected.

commit.message: Add first test case for multiple model file use case

nodes.bodyText: can you add a little bit more description on what is expected here? Is it the configuration applied by model file 1 is overwritten, in which order the model files are applied?

This check has to be done right after the checkPodReady(adminServerPodName, domainUid, domainNamespace);
I have seen that when admin services are  not created because of any errors like in T3ChannelPort not matching with nodePort, the managed servers pods are not created. But it throws off us to the debugging as to why the managed servers are not created than concentrating on the admin server services creation failures.
There is only one test in the class, do we still need the method order?
Why this test shouldn't be run in parallel?

commit.message: Add doc link to the comments
